name: Magic Jump
description:
Endless platformer where young magician try to reach tower's top!

Try to beat your own highscore or compete with your friends on one computer in a hotseat mode.

Different platforms will make your gameplay omnigenous and interesting.

Control:

  • Mute sound if you don't like it (you may). Just click with the left mouse button on the button in the main menu;
  • "Up" and "Down" keys to navigate in the main menu;
  • "Enter" (or "Return") to confirm;
  • "Left" and "Right" buttons to move hero in the chosen direction;
  • "Spacebar" to jump;
  • "Escape" to pause game.

Enjoy your game!

P. S. Made with LÖVE.
